Just to let you guys know, it's a large file, so it is gonna take a while to download (4 hours or more). 

I suggest start your D/L grab something to eat, watch a long movie or take care of your business and come back and watch the game. Most of all please seed when you are done downloading. 

It is a a great game, enjoy!
